operations.notes:
Add a comment to a product. If you like to comment on a ratings, you can use the rating id as the product id. If you need the ability to comment on both ratings and products you can either use two different domains or prefix the productId depending on the type of comment, e.g. PROD-3384, RATING-34. This method will either redirect to the created comment or the product summary depending on the incoming uri.
